name: CR Item Masters
query:
SELECT
A.process_no as "Process No:Data:80",
A.name as "Item Code:Link/Item:140",
A.item_name as "Item Name:Data:270",
A.rollon_code as "ROLLON Code:Data:130",
A.item_group as "Item Group:Data:130",
A.description as "Description:Data:250"

FROM
`tabItem` AS A

WHERE
A.item_group=%(item_group)s

ORDER BY A.rollon_code DESC, A.process_no DESC
